i1.name: Crystal Spires
description:
{{sbc|Innate:}} '''Skarner's''' presence causes 6 ''Crystal Spires'' to appear at set points on the [[Summoner's Rift|battlefield]]:
* One beside {{uis|Baron Nashor}} pit
* One beside {{uis|Dragon}} pit
* One nearby each buff {{tip|monster|monster's}} camp

''Crystal Spires'' can be captured by {{tip|champions}} after {{tip|minion|minions}} have spawned by standing near them for 2 seconds. Once captured, ''Crystal Spires'' are owned until contested and the defending team can stand on the spire to prevent the opposing team from capturing it.

''Crystal Spires'' grant {{g|30 gold}} split among its captors upon being captured, or {{g|15 gold}} if only a single champion participated in its capture, and provide {{tip|sight}} around them for {{fd|1.5}} seconds upon being captured, becoming unable to be recaptured for 15 seconds.

'''Skarner''' gains ''Crystal Charge'' while within range of a ''Crystal Spire'' controlled by his team, for {{fd|1.25}} seconds after triggering {{ai|Crystal Venom|Skarner}}, or for {{fd|1.75}} seconds after stinging an enemy champion with {{ai|Impale|Skarner}}.

{{sbc|Crystal Charge:}} '''Skarner''' gains {{passive progression/deprecated version|18|70|72|74|76|78|80|82|85|88|91|94|97|100|104|108|112|116|120|formula = 68 + 2 per level up to 7, + 3 per level up to 13, and + 4 per level|color=ms}} {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}}, {{passive progression/deprecated version|18|key=%|43|48|53|58|63|68|73|80|87|94|101|108|115|124|133|142|151|160|formula = 38 + 5 per level up to 7, + 7 per level up to 13, and + 9 per level|color=as}} {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} and restores {{sti|mana|{{as|1% '''maximum''' mana}}}} every {{fd|0.5}} seconds.
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Skarner's presence causes 6 Crystal Spires to appear at set points on the Summoner's Rift:
* One beside Baron Nashor's pit
* One beside Dragon's pit
* One nearby each buff monster's campCrystal Spires can be captured by champions after minions have spawned by standing near them for 2 seconds. Once captured, Crystal Spires are owned until contested and the defending team can stand on the spire to prevent the opposing team from capturing it.Crystal Spires grant 30 gold split among its captors upon being captured, or 15 gold if only a single champion participated in its capture, and provide sight around them for 1.5 seconds upon being captured, becoming unable to be recaptured for 15 seconds.Skarner gains Crystal Charge while within range of a Crystal Spire controlled by his team, for 1.25 seconds after triggering Crystal Venom, or for 1.75 seconds after stinging an enemy champion with Impale.Crystal Charge: Skarner gains Unknown value: passive progression/deprecated version 18 70 72 74 76 78 80 82 85 88 91 94 97 100 104 108 112 116 120 formula = 68 + 2 per level up to 7, + 3 per level up to 13, and + 4 per level color=ms bonus movement speed, Unknown value: passive progression/deprecated version 18 key=% 43 48 53 58 63 68 73 80 87 94 101 108 115 124 133 142 151 160 formula = 38 + 5 per level up to 7, + 7 per level up to 13, and + 9 per level color=as bonus attack speed and restores 1% maximum mana every 0.5 seconds.
i1.notes: * ''Crystal Charge's'' duration refreshes if it was gained by an ability.

q1.name: Crystal Slash
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Skarner''' slashes around himself, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to all surrounding enemies.
If an enemy is hit, subsequent uses of ''Crystal Slash'' within 5 seconds deal {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}.
Basic attacks against non-structures reduce ''Crystal Slash's'' {{sti|cooldown}} by {{fd|0.25}} seconds, quadrupled to 1 against enemy champions.
q1.descriptionHtml: Active: Skarner slashes around himself, dealing physical damage to all surrounding enemies.If an enemy is hit, subsequent uses of Crystal Slash within 5 seconds deal bonus magic damage.Basic attacks against non-structures reduce Crystal Slash's cooldown by 0.25 seconds, quadrupled to 1 against enemy champions.
leveling: {{st|Physical Damage|{{as|{{ap|1 to 3}}% of target's '''maximum''' health}} {{as|(+ 20% AD)}}}}

{{st|Bonus Magic Damage|{{as|{{ap|1 to 3}}% of target's '''maximum''' health}} {{as|(+ 20% AD)}} {{as|(+ 30% AP)}}|Total Mixed Damage|{{as|{{ap|1*2 to 3*2}}% of target's '''maximum''' health}} {{as|(+ 40% AD)}} {{as|(+ 30% AP)}}}}
q1.notes: * {{tip|Spell shield}} will block the damage but will not prevent '''Skarner''' from triggering the bonus effect.

w1.name: Crystalline Exoskeleton
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Skarner''' crystallizes himself, gaining a {{tip|shield}} for up to 6 seconds and initial {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} that accelerates by 100% over 3 seconds while the shield holds.
w1.descriptionHtml: Active: Skarner crystallizes himself, gaining a shield for up to 6 seconds and initial bonus movement speed that accelerates by 100% over 3 seconds while the shield holds.

r1.name: Impale
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Skarner''' {{tip|root|roots}} the target enemy {{tip|champion}} during the ability's cast time and attempts to impale them with his stinger. Upon successfully impaling the target, he deals them {{as|60% AD}} {{as|physical damage|physical damage}} and {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage|magic damage}}, and {{tip|true sight|reveals}} and {{tip|suppression|suppresses}} them for {{fd|1.75}} seconds, during which he can drag his victim with himself. At the end of the duration, the target takes the same damage again.
''Impale'' pierces through {{tip|displacement immunity}}, dragging them out.{{tt|*|See details for more information.}}
''During the ability '''Skarner''' is locked out from [[basic attack]]ing, casting {{ai|Fracture|Skarner}}, or using {{si|Flash}}.''
r1.descriptionHtml: Active: Skarner roots the target enemy champion during the ability's cast time and attempts to impale them with his stinger. Upon successfully impaling the target, he deals them 60% AD physical damage and bonus magic damage, and reveals and suppresses them for 1.75 seconds, during which he can drag his victim with himself. At the end of the duration, the target takes the same damage again.Impale pierces through displacement immunity, dragging them out.*During the ability Skarner is locked out from basic attacking, casting Fracture, or using Flash.
leveling: {{st|Bonus Magic Damage|{{ap|20 to 100}}  {{as|(+ 50% AP)}}|Total Mixed Damage|{{ap|20*2 to 100*2}}  {{as|(+ 120% AD)}} {{as|(+ 100% AP)}}}}
r1.notes:
* The target will not take ''Impale's'' secondary damage if the {{tip|suppression}} is removed.
* If the target becomes {{tip|untargetable}}, dies, '''Skarner''' loses {{tip|sight}} of them, or they move 800 units away from him during the cast time, ''Impale'' cancels but does not go on {{sti|cooldown}} nor consume {{sti|{{as|mana}}}}.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will not block the {{tip|root}}.
* ''Impale'' is special cased to end prematurely if the target is affected by {{ai|Devour|Tahm Kench}}, both for an ally and enemy {{ci|Tahm Kench}} or if '''Skarner''' is teleported by {{ai|Realm Warp|Ryze}}.
** ''Impale'' will not end prematurely if '''Skarner''' enters {{tip|resurrection}}.
* ''Impale'' applies a small displacement to the target every {{fd|0.25}} seconds whenever they are not close to '''Skarner'''. These displacements do '''not''' apply {{tip|airborne}} and are not {{tt|flagged as displacements|For instance, Mordekaiser R and Sett R do not force-move their target in the classic sense, but pretend to be displacements for interactions like these.}}, meaning that targets who are not {{tip|Cc-immune|immune}} to the {{tip|suppression}} are also never immune to the displacement, either. As a consequence, {{tip|displacement immunity}} '''fails''' to ignore this movement. ''See the table below.''
* While ''Impale'' is active, and for the purposes of direction-conditioned abilities, (e.g. {{ai|Petrifying Gaze|Cassiopeia}}, {{ai|Mocking Shout|Tryndamere}}) '''Skarner''' is considered to be facing in the direction he is moving and not the one his model is facing.
{{Skarner Impale Unstoppability Interactions}}
